overview: The story of Frankie Barbello, the son of Rocco and Luisa, facing the aftermath of the Pizzapasta massacre that occurred seventeen years prior, on the day of his birth. When faced with a shocking revelation, Frankie unlocks new potential that threatens to tear his family apart. But who can he trust in this "country of opportunity?" Can he trust the mysterious survivor of the Pizzapasta massacre, who has been tasked with carrying on the Pizzapasta mob name? Can he trust his family? Can he even trust himself?
tagline: When the moon hits your eye, like a big pizza pie...
title: That's Amore Dué
